item.title: The World Around Us: back to words with J
item.description: Isaac Asimov The most exciting phrase to hear in science, the one that heralds new discoveries, is not “Eureka!” (I’ve found it!), but “That’s funny…” Sometimes everybody wants to get off the beaten track and see the world. See how many exciting discoveries are waiting for you there. I want to bring your attention to a language, which changed the vision of some things for me. This language is J.
